subject: clutch pedal
description_text: Hi, is it possible to just buy the clutch pedal to the Pro X Pedal Upgrade in  the future

conversations.body_text: Hi, I will check the cost with our colleague tomorrow and give you a separate link if you need it .
Hi，Joachim Linnaeus，  您打算在哪个平台购买？我们会向您发送相应的链接。

aliexpress, is thats what you woundering?
________________________________
Från: service@simsonn.com
Hi Joakim Linné,  Here is the link to the clutch pedal we put out for you: https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-simulator-pedal-black

dose it work with the Pro X pedal set or is it possible to get the clutch pedal from the Pro X Set
________________________________
Från: service@simsonn.com

Hi Joakim Linné,  Sorry, you can just buy this link and I'll make a note for you to ship the Pro X clutch. Or I can provide you with a link to the Pro X clutch tomorrow and you can buy it, but it will definitely be more expensive than this.
